node.title: Modern Themes
node.excerpt: Adds multiple asthetic modern themes to select in File > Preferences > Setting > Apearence!

node.title: Spooky Theme
node.excerpt: Adds a new spooky color theme to select inside the settings window.

node.title: Simple Block Rotation
node.excerpt: Adding rotation to blocks is as easy as it should be: Adding a single component!
